artist: After Lucio Massari; Francesco Rosaspina; Gaetano Guadagnini
description: in foreground man in rags kneeling before richly dressed man; servant holding clothes at right; outside arch, man on horse and two figures; above angels playing musical instruments seated on a cloud; arched composition

title: The Prodigal Son
